channel.title: Client with server help
channel.description: hello i need help to edit my client version with server cuz i have downloaded rscd_v25 3 something and no client inside how and what i need to edit from client from other source but same rscd_v25 ? hope understand what i hawe mean :)

item.title: Client with server help
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Iâ€™m sure if you looked around you could find what your looking for.

Recently I asked a similar question. Use an already existing client for the RSCD base and change the version and make your own changes.

You can change the client version server side in the wold.xml or you can change the version of the client in the mudclient. Look around where it assigns the version number and you will be set.

Read full topic
